itemInfo.itemDesc:
A fine flour made by Grinding.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Wheat.

- Usage: Essence of Liquor, Meat Stew, Oatmeal, etc.

item.name: Wheat
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by a variety of methods.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Costa Farm, Moretti Plantation, and Northern Wheat Plantation. It can also be obtained by Farming Wheat Seeds using a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, Vinegar, etc.

item.name: High-Quality Wheat
item.desc:
A Cooking ingredient that was produced through Farming.
- How to Obtain: Seeds can be obtained through Plant Breeding in a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, etc.

item.name: Special Wheat
item.desc:
A Cooking ingredient that was produced through Farming.
- How to Obtain: Seeds can be obtained through Plant Breeding in a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, etc.

item.name: Wheat Dough
item.desc:
A product made by Shaking Wheat Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.
